broadwick.graph.writer

Class GraphMl

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.graph.writer.GraphMl

  • public final class GraphMl
extends Object
    Simple class to write the nodes/edges of a network in graphML format.

        Graph<? extends Vertex,? extends Edge<Vertex>> network)
        Save the graph as in graphML format in the given file.
        Parameters:
        network - the network object to be saved.
        file - the name of the file in which the graph will be saved.

        Add an edge to the graphML document.
